title: SThayer
author: SThayer
content: 5MW site on 3.3 acres in the States. Mix of hydro and coal power.Turn key hosting siteIncluded in the sale:5MW of power already installed. Additional 8MW is possible after applying for the permits. This would bring it to 13MW total.4 40 foot containers. 4 1770 KVA transformers.Power and space to add a 5th container.5.9 cent power exempt from state sales tax.Buy the business and lease the land and buildings. Option to buy the land and buildings.Two buildings. One open 4000 Sq ft building. One large building with a 4000 Sq ft warehouse, a 7000 Sq ft warehouse, offices, and 2 loading docks.2.1 million for the whole enchilada, 1.6m for just the business assets

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: post some pictures - maybe at least say what state it is in.
